scripts.test: npm run check-version && export NODE_ENV=test && mocha './test/unit/**/*.js'
scripts.build: npm run check-version && npm run build-cldrjs-core && npm run build-cldrjs-event && npm run build-cldrjs-supplemental && npm run build-cldrjs-unresolved
scripts.build-cldrjs-core: npm run check-version && for _BABEL_ENV in browser node; do BABEL_ENV=$_BABEL_ENV rollup --config src/build/core/rollup-config.js; done
scripts.build-cldrjs-event: npm run check-version && for _BABEL_ENV in browser node; do BABEL_ENV=$_BABEL_ENV rollup --config src/build/event/rollup-config.js; done
scripts.build-cldrjs-supplemental: npm run check-version && for _BABEL_ENV in browser node; do BABEL_ENV=$_BABEL_ENV rollup --config src/build/supplemental/rollup-config.js; done
scripts.build-cldrjs-unresolved: npm run check-version && for _BABEL_ENV in browser node; do BABEL_ENV=$_BABEL_ENV rollup --config src/build/unresolved/rollup-config.js; done
scripts.postbuild: npm run compare-size && npm run dco
scripts.test-functional: npm run check-version && export NODE_ENV=test-functional && mocha './test/functional/*.js'
